name: Kaju Kathili
description: Kaju Kathili is a delicious traditional North Indian sweet made with cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Badam Kathili
description: Badam Kathili is a Indian style fudge made with blanched almond flour, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Pistha Kathili
description: Pistha Kathili is a delicious North Indian sweet made with  Pistachio powder, cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Kesar Kathili
description: Kesar katli is a Indian sweet is made of milk, grated coconut, sugar, corn flour, green cardamom seeds, almonds, pistachios and kesar (saffron).

name: Gulab Kathili
description: Fascinating, alluring and rich Gulab Kaju Katli is a unique combination of aromatic fragrance of the dried rose petals and Rich Cashews.

name: Chocolate Kathili
description: A sweet conflagration of sugar, cocoa powder and cashew bits.

name: Kaju Honeydew
description: Kaju Honeydew is a delicious traditional North Indian sweet made with cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Kaju Kamalbouge
description: Kaju Kamalbouge is a delicious traditional North Indian sweet made with cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Kaju Chakra
description: Kaju Chakra is a delicious traditional North Indian sweet made with cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.

name: Kaju Sandwich
description: Kaju katli is a delicious traditional North Indian sweet made with cashew nuts, sugar and cardamom powder.
